description: <p>Dorking Hospital Inpatients<br /> <br /> Bank Staff Nurse - Band 5 - Flexible Hours with no obligation to work hours offered<br /> <br /> We are currently recruiting dedicated and motivated registered and unregistered bank nurses to our Adult Services inpatient rehabilitation team at Dorking Hospital. Ranmore Ward is a 28 bedded ward providing physical rehabilitation to the local population. The ward has been recently refurbished to a high standard and within dementia friendly guidelines. Individuals will be expected to deliver and maintain a high standard of clinical and professional Nursing Care; and to assist in the delivery of all aspects of individualised patient care.<br /> <br /> Do you want: <br /> • To be an integral member of a dedicated team<br /> • To join a forward thinking, innovative organisation which puts its patients first <br /> • To contribute to the provision of high quality care within your local community. <br /> If you do, then we want to hear from you as we are currently recruiting to our centralised bank.<br /><br /> We can offer flexible working, attractive salaries, development opportunities and much, much more.<br /><br /> Early (0730 to 1530), Late (1230 to 2030), Night (2000 to 0800) and Long Day (0730 to 2030) shifts are available however there is some flexibility with timings. <br /> These are temporary working posts and work will be offered as they become available, which maybe at short notice. <br /> <br /> Bank nurses at CSH Surrey are integral to our workforce. They are highly valued and we offer the same benefits that substantive staff receive such as annual Leave and NHS pension scheme.<br /><br /> Dorking Hospital has free onsite parking. <br /> <br /> For further information please contact – Flexible Workforce Co-ordinator: csh.flexibleworkforce@nhs.net</p>
title: Bank Band 5 Staff Nurses
